ModMetaData.name: CutePenguin
ModMetaData.author: totobrother, Mehni
ModMetaData.description:
Add new cute animal [Penguin] for game. This penguins are modified Mehni. So They have incredible intelligence. They can haul your items and clean your base! Don't treat them harsh. They are useful!
Code : Mehni XML : totobrother Art : totobrother
